net.sf.juffrou.reflect

Class DefaultBeanWrapperFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.juffrou.reflect.DefaultBeanWrapperFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeanWrapperFactory

    public class DefaultBeanWrapperFactory
extends Object
implements BeanWrapperFactory
    This class is responsible for creating and caching BeanWrapperContexts.

    A BeanWrapper uses the same BeanWrapperFactory to create the BeanWrapperContexts for its nested BeanWrappers. BeanWrapperFactory can also be used as an umbrella to create BeanWrappers in a more performant way as it caches the introspection information and re-uses it whenever possible.

    Author:
    cemartins

    • Method Detail

      • getBeanWrapperContext

        public BeanWrapperContext getBeanWrapperContext(Class clazz)
        Retrieves a BeanWrapperContext for java bean class.

        If the BeanWrapperContext is not in cache then creates a new one.

        Specified by:
        getBeanWrapperContext in interface BeanWrapperFactory
        Parameters:
        clazz - the bean class to inspect
        Returns:
        a BeanWrapperContext with introspection information about the specified class.

      • getBeanWrapperContext

        public BeanWrapperContext getBeanWrapperContext(Class clazz,
                                       Type... types)
        Retrieves a BeanWrapperContext for a parameterized (generic) java bean class.

        If the BeanWrapperContext is not in cache then creates a new one.

        Specified by:
        getBeanWrapperContext in interface BeanWrapperFactory
        Parameters:
        clazz - the generic bean class to inspect.
        types - the parameters that defined the generic bean class.
        Returns:
        a BeanWrapperContext with introspection information about the specified class.

      • getBeanWrapper

        public JuffrouBeanWrapper getBeanWrapper(Class clazz)
        Construct a bean wrapper around a class.

        Bean instances will be instances of that class and will be created only when necessary.
        Try to use a cached BeanWrapperContext to save introspection time.

        Specified by:
        getBeanWrapper in interface BeanWrapperFactory
        Parameters:
        clazz - class to instantiate the wrapped bean
        Returns:
        a BeanWrapper around a null bean of type clazz. The bean will be instantiated automatically upon calling JuffrouBeanWrapper.setValue(String, Object) or JuffrouBeanWrapper.getBean()

      • getBeanWrapper

        public JuffrouBeanWrapper getBeanWrapper(Object instance)
        Construct a bean wrapper around an existing bean instance.

        Will try to use a cached BeanWrapperContext to save introspection time.

        Specified by:
        getBeanWrapper in interface BeanWrapperFactory
        Parameters:
        instance - the bean object to be wrapped
        Returns:
        a BeanWrapper around the object passed.

      • getBeanInstanceBuilder

        public BeanInstanceBuilder getBeanInstanceBuilder()
        Description copied from interface: BeanWrapperFactory
        Obtains the builder that will be used to create bean instances every time a bean instantiation is needed.
        Specified by:
        getBeanInstanceBuilder in interface BeanWrapperFactory
        Returns:
        an instance of BeanInstanceBuilder.
